resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106178</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106178</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Big Picture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Grosse Abbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grande Image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Retrato Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Immagine Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη εικόνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cuadro Grande</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a weekly jigsaw puzzle from the Library of Congress's photo collection. Once the photo is assembled, the reader can search the Library's web site to identify it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein wöchentliches Puzzle von der Bibliothek 
der Fotoansammlung des Kongresses. Sobald das Foto 
zusammengebaut wird, kann der Leser die Web site der Bibliothek 
suchen, um sie zu kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un puzzle denteux hebdomadaire de la 
bibliothèque de la collection de la photo du congrès. Une fois
que la photo est assemblée, le lecteur peut rechercher le site Web de
la bibliothèque pour l'identifier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um enigma jigsaw semanal da biblioteca da 
coleção da foto do congress. Uma vez que a foto é montada, o 
leitor pode procurarar o Web site da biblioteca para identificá-lo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un puzzle jigsaw settimanale dalla libreria 
dell'accumulazione della foto del congresso. Una volta che la 
foto è montata, il lettore può cercare il Web site delle biblioteche
per identificarlo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένας εβδομαδιαίος γρίφος τορνευτικών πριονιών 
από τη συλλογή φωτογραφιών βιβλιοθήκης του συνεδρίου. 
Μόλις συγκεντρωθεί η φωτογραφία, ο αναγνώστης μπορεί να 
ψάξει τον ιστοχώρο της βιβλιοθήκης για να την προσδιορίσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un rompecabezas semanal del rompecabezas de la 
biblioteca de la colección de la foto del congreso. Una vez que
se ensamble la foto, el programa de lectura puede buscar el Web site 
de la biblioteca para identificarlo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106178</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-big-picture</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
